name: Getall
description:
> Check the new [Promotions onboarding guide](https://developers.vtex.com/vtex-rest-api/docs/promotions-overview). We created this guide to improve the onboarding experience for developers at VTEX. It assembles all documentation on our Developer Portal about Promotions and is organized by focusing on the developer's journey.

 Retrieves all coupons from an account.

Accept.description: HTTP Client Negotiation Accept Header. Indicates the types of responses the client can understand

$block: Object with information about the coupon.

$ul: **isArchived**: Defines if the coupon is archived (`true`) or not (`false`).
**lastModifiedUtc**: Date and time of the last update of the coupon in UTC format.
**maxItemsPerClient**: Maximum items per client that the coupon can be applied.
